body:
Myer is one of the largest women’s footwear retailers in Australia, stocking over 70 brands in a breathtaking array of designer, contemporary, athletic, classic, comfort and youth styles.


Myer has the most comprehensive range of comfort and classic footwear in the country and is a shopping destination for all women indulging their shoe obsession.
title: Text Title

body:
Myer uses three footwear sizing standards; European, UK, and Australian/USA. Imprinted inside the shoe or on the sole, and on the shoe box, the size number indicates the shoe length.


Work between the standards using size conversion charts found in the footwear reserve at your store. Ask a footwear team member if youâ€™d like help locating it.

SIZE SELLS


At Myer, 95% of womenâ€™s shoes sold are between size 6 and 10, so most styles only range in these sizes.


Selected styles range smaller or larger sizes.

title: Text Input Title

body:
Womenâ€™s footwear usually come in an average width, also known as â€˜Bâ€™ or â€˜Mâ€™ fits. Where the width isnâ€™t specified, you can assume the width is average.


American brands such as Nine West, Guess and Steve Madden can have slightly narrower fits.


Hush Puppies and Easy Steps offer shoes in wider â€˜Câ€™ fits. The widest fit we sell is â€˜Dâ€™ fit, available in the Widesteps brand.
title: Text Title

body: Press the image below to learn more.

_items.text:
TRY BEFORE YOU BUY


Sizes can vary between brands and styles, so itâ€™s essential to try on shoes before buying them. For a realistic fit, shop in the evening as your feet can swell up to 8%.

title: Text Reveal Title

body:
To test shoes for fit, start by putting them on and standing up. They should feel comfortable, not bulge over the top or hang over the insole.


Next, walk in the shoes. There should be no pain - pressing, pinching, scraping, slipping or sliding are signs the shoe doesnâ€™t fit well, so consider another size or style.


If they're slightly too big on one foot, then insoles, shoe cushions and heel grips are your secret weapon. They can help fill out the shoe, while providing extra comfort and repelling moisture.


Joanne Mercer

General Manager Womens Footwear & Accessories

title: GMCQ Title

body: Here is a collection of other trending footwear styles. How many of these do you know?

_items.body:
Red 


The colour of the season and will be seen in heels, flats and boots.

Loafers 


A casual shoe, shaped like a moccasin with a flat heel.

Sock boots


Stretch microfiber and knitted shafts give these dress boots a customised fit like a 'sock'.

Pointed toe pumps


From low kitten to sky scraper heels this classic silhouette is a wardrobe must have this season.

title: Narrative Title

body:
There are so many gorgeous styles to choose from this season - I have two favourites. For work I canâ€™t go pass the Becky sling back in red from Innovare made in Italy. The choked topline adds a contemporary twist to a classic style, the block heel and kid leather lining allow for all day comfort and of course the handcrafted Italian leather upper in this seasonâ€™s red adds an instant style update to any outfit.


For weekends I love the Inky boot in taupe from Zazou. The ultra soft leather upper and leather lining makes them super comfortable when Iâ€™m dashing from one appointment to another, the taupe colour works back with all my casual outfits and the scratched leather on the back adds material interest. 


Joanne Mercer

General Manager Womens Footwear & Accessories
title: Text Title

body:
In summary, the womenâ€™s footwear size conversion table available in every womenâ€™s footwear reserve makes it easy to work between AU/US, EU and UK size standards.

In addition, the footwear trends making a splash this season include:


- Ankle boots â€“ dressy stiletto or covered block heels or casual with stacked heels

- Ballerina flats

- Man tailored loafers and lace ups

- Knit sneakers.
